text: I posted this <https://github.com/JuliaWeb/HTTP.jl/issues/553#issuecomment-778829135|issue> a while back and decided to try the new Download std lib that comes with Julia 1.6 to see if it would happen there. Then I experimented running HTTP.jl in 1.6 and the problem disappeared for this Julia version but persists for previous Julia versions. Does anyone have a clue why this might be happening?

elements.text: a while back and decided to try the new Download std lib that comes with Julia 1.6 to see if it would happen there. Then I experimented running HTTP.jl in 1.6 and the problem disappeared for this Julia version but persists for previous Julia versions. Does anyone have a clue why this might be happening?

text: I’m not sure. I’m not surprised by a difference between Downloads and HTTP.jl, but maybe there was a fix in 1.6 that HTTP.jl was suffering from.
